This document explains the steps required to analyze the uGrow home placement test data.
**Types of data**: Breastfeeding, bottle feeding, sleeping, crying, feedback data

```{r}
summary(cars)
```

You can also embed plots, for example:

```{r, echo=FALSE}
plot(cars)
```

Note that the `echo = FALSE` parameter was added to the code chunk to prevent printing of the R code that generated the plot.
